QuestData.Title: Rage and Wisdom
QuestData.Description: Beasts of the western wasteland fight an endless war with the creatures of the eastern wilds.$b$bIf one side were to overwhelm the other, all of Draenor would be doomed at the hand of the victor.$b$bThe Laughing Skull seek revenge for their destroyed village. I have directed them to aim their vengeance at the nearby creatures, that our outpost here might be preserved.$b$bIf you would, commander, oversee their efforts. I have not yet grown to trust the Laughing Skull.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bony Xuk at Affliction Ridge.
QuestData.RewardText: I can see the future of my enemies in the bones. They're gonna die!
